meanings.definition: Feel bitterness or indignation at (a circumstance, action, or person).
meanings.sent1: She resents having to do chores every day.
meanings.sent2: He resents the way his boss treats him unfairly.
meanings.sent3: The cat resents the new puppy getting all the attention.
meanings.sent4: The old tree resents the harsh winds that bend its branches.
meanings.sent5: The student resents the strict rules imposed by the school.
